title: HAP 59 - Frowning at Froudacious Fabrications - J.J. Thomas and F.A. Durham
itunes:title: HAP 59 - Frowning at Froudacious Fabrications - J.J. Thomas and F.A. Durham
description: John Jacob Thomas argues for self-government in the English colonies of the Caribbean but his fellow Trinidadian Frederick Alexander Durham recommends repatriation to Africa instead.
content:encoded: John Jacob Thomas argues for self-government in the English colonies of the Caribbean but his fellow Trinidadian Frederick Alexander Durham recommends repatriation to Africa instead.
itunes:subtitle: John Jacob Thomas argues for self-government in the English colonies of the Caribbean but his fellow Trinidadian Frederick Alexander Durham recommends repatriation to Africa instead.
itunes:summary: John Jacob Thomas argues for self-government in the English colonies of the Caribbean but his fellow Trinidadian Frederick Alexander Durham recommends repatriation to Africa instead.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
